alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Florence and northwestern Marion Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marion, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Mullins, Blue Brick, Rains, and Carolinas Hospital System - Marion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
